price: 74. hormis Iblîs qui se montra orgueilleux et fut du nombre des mécréants.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
